content: Captain Void-Illusion is one of four "Captains" that you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. Unlike the other Captains, Void-Illusion isn't actually a boss fight, but still has an important item to loot.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Captain_Void-Illusion.md', within the main section titled 'Captain Void-Illusion'.
The content is as follows:
Captain Void-Illusion is one of four "Captains" that you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. Unlike the other Captains, Void-Illusion isn't actually a boss fight, but still has an important item to loot.
